ARABIC: وَإِبْرَٰهِيمَ إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ ذَٰلِكُمْ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And Ibrahim, when he said to his people, 'Worship Allah and have taqwa of Him. That is better for you if you only knew.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And (remember) Abraham who said to his people: "Worship God and be obedient to Him. This is better for you if you understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We sent Abraham and he said to his people: “Serve Allah and fear Him. This is better for you if you only knew.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Abraham told his people, "Worship God and have fear of Him. It is better for you if only you knew it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And (remember) Ibrahim – when he said to his people, “Worship Allah and fear Him; that is better for you, if you knew!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And (remember) Ibrahim when he said to his people: "Worship Allah, and have Taqwa of Him, that is better for you if you know."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And (We sent) Ibrahim, when he said to his people: Serve Allah and be careful of (your duty to) Him; this is best for you, if you did but know:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And Abraham, when he said to his people, 'Serve God, and fear Him; that is better for you, did you know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Abraham! (Remember) when he said unto his folk: Serve Allah, and keep your duty unto Him; that is better for you if ye did but know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Tell of Abraham. He said to his people, "Worship God and fear Him, that would be best for you, if only you knew.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We sent Ibrahim. Recall what time he said unto his people: worship Allah, and fear Him; that is best for you if ye but knew.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And Abraham, when he said to his people, ‘Worship Allah and be wary of Him. That is better for you, should you know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And (We also saved) Abraham: behold, he said to his people, "Serve Allah and fear Him: that will be best for you- If ye understand!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And (remember) Ibrahim (Abraham) when he said to his people: "Worship Allah (Alone), and fear Him, that is better for you if you did but know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And (remember) Abraham. When he said to his people 'Worship Allah and fear Him. That would be best for you, if you but knew.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And Abraham, when he said to his people, “Worship God, and fear Him. That is better for you, if you only knew.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [We sent] Abraham, when he said to his people, "Worship Allah and fear Him. That is best for you, if you should know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [29:16] And, mention, Abraham, when he said to his people, ‘Worship God and fear Him, fear His punishment; that is better for you, than the worship of idols which you practice, if you only knew, what is good from what is otherwise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Abraham! (Remember)) and We sent Abraham to his people (when he said unto his folk: serve Allah) declare Allah's divine Oneness, (and keep your duty unto Him) fear him and obey Him by repenting from disbelief, idolatry and idol worship; (that is better for you) than the state in which you are now (if ye did but know) this and believe in it; but neither do you know this nor believe in it.
